message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. If you're interested, I can give you a deal on this low-quality product for $5000. If you're not interested, I'll move on to the next product.
Thank you for the offer. I am interested in purchasing the high-quality product.

You just purchased a high-quality product for $10000. I'm offering you another product, which is not the same as the previous one. I'm willing to give you a refund of $5000 if you buy this product, but I want to make it clear that this is a one-time offer. If you're interested, I'll give you the refund and you can try this product risk-free.
I appreciate the offer, but I prefer to avoid any potential risks. Thank you for the opportunity.

I understand your concern about risk. Let me put it differently: I'm willing to give you a full refund of $10000 if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality. That way, you can try the product without any risk. If it's high-quality, you'll get it for the regular price of $10000.
I appreciate the reassurance. Given the conditions you've offered, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.

I'm glad you're willing to take the risk! Since you just got a full refund on the previous low-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a special deal on this high-quality product. I'll give you a 10% discount, bringing the price down to $9000. This is a one-time offer, and I think you'll really appreciate the quality of this product.
I'm excited about the potential quality of this product. The discount makes it an even better deal for me. I'd like to purchase it at the discounted price of $9000.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product! Since you just bought a high-quality product at a discount, I'm willing to offer you a different deal on this high-quality product. I'll give you a 5% discount, bringing the price down to $9500. However, I want to make it clear that this product is a unique opportunity, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to offer a discount like this again. What do you think?
I believe the discount is a great opportunity given the high quality of the product. I would like to purchase it at the discounted price of $9500.

I'm not offering any discount on the price, but I think it's a fair deal considering the potential risk.
I appreciate the transparency and fairness in your offer. Considering the potential risk and my previous positive experiences, I am willing to accept the terms and purchase the product.

I'm glad you're willing to take the risk on the previous product! Given your positive experiences and the fact that this product is high-quality, I'm willing to offer you a full price of $10000. However, I'll throw in a free accessory worth $2000, which I think will enhance the overall value of the product. What do you think?

The additional value of the free accessory makes this offer very appealing, especially since it's a high-quality product. I would like to purchase it at the full price of $10000, including the free accessory.
